name: Space Run (itch) (William Pittenger)
description:
Title: Space Run

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: Space Run is a casual endless runner and platformer. Avoid the pitfalls and the laser that is chasing you.

Instructions: The goal of the game is to not fall or get stuck for as long as possible. Press space to jump and enter to start. You may also jump mid-air once until you land.

Game Design Team: William Pittenger – Game Designer
